com.cloud.resources.magicindicator.buildins.commonnavigator.abs

类 CommonNavigatorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloud.resources.magicindicator.buildins.commonnavigator.abs.CommonNavigatorAdapter

  • public abstract class CommonNavigatorAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    CommonNavigator适配器，通过它可轻松切换不同的指示器样式 博客: http://hackware.lucode.net Created by hackware on 2016/6/26.
